template.subject: Action Required: New Assessment / Evaluation Task
template.body:
Dear %TARGET_FIRSTNAME% %TARGET_LASTNAME%,
A new assessment or evaluation task has been made available for you to complete (or delegate) in MEdTech Central. To proceed, please click the following link:
%URL%
As a refresher your username is %USERNAME%, and if you have any trouble remembering your password you can reset it by clicking the following link, and entering %EMAIL% as your e-mail address.
%ENTRADA_URL%/password_reset
If you have received this email on an earlier date, please be advised that the link to this delegation task has been revised, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know.
Sincerely, %CREATOR_FIRSTNAME% %CREATOR_LASTNAME% %CREATOR_EMAIL%
